Message:
All of these customary presents
are wonderful in their own way.

My gift needs to be
even more special...!

Still without any ideas,
I returned to the mansion, and...

Just as I was thinking
about you, here you are
right before my very eyes.
This must be destiny.

...But, you’re usually working
in your room at this hour, right?
So, why are you...?

Could it be, you’re also trying to
find a present for someone...?

I quietly watched to see
what he was up to,
when I saw him with a little girl
who had a big smile on her face.

“Thank you for coming
to see me, Daddy!”
